1.content:
You have been lost in the woods for some time now. It is dark and cold, and a storm is slowly growing in the night sky. You look up and see silhouetted in the night sky, a large castle. Hoping to find shelter from the storm, you immediately head towards the castle. You reach the door to the castle and knock. The door slowly opens, revealing a warm light inside. You slowly enter the castle, but as you do, the door slams shut behind you.

"HELLO!" a chorus of feminine voices greet you. You look and see a small crowd of young women in white satin dresses, smiling at you.

"Hello, I am Zoot, welcome to Castle Anthrax," one of them says to you.

"Anthrax?" you say, not liking the sound of that.

"Tis not a very good name, but enough of us for now, who are you?" Zoot says.
1.title: Welcome to Castle Anthrax!  Who Are You?

11.content: You are a furry, but what kind?
11.title: What Kind of Furry

choices: I'd like to go to bed now
111.content:
You come in closer and look around. The rather dim corridor is lighted by multiple torches on the walls and those held by the castle inhabitans. In front of you stands a tall white furred vixen wearing a robe that at the same time covers her from feet to head up, and seems to hide very little of her feminine curves.

"What is thy name, brave knight?" she leans a bit asking you that.

"I'm Sir Garabbat, I was looking for shelter from the storm and the lights pointing this way." you unintenionally emphesise when you notice lady Zoots tiny lumps pointing through her robe. You are a grey rabbit, with shoulder lenght white hair. You are in your early 20s and stand about 5 feet tall (which is pretty good for a rabbit).

"I see, please follow me, I'll show you to a room you can take." She said and turned around. You took a few seconds staring at her shapely rear in front of you. As you walk by you pass numerous lovely looking and quite shapely ladies of different species. They are all wearing white long robes of various kind, some whole covering like Zoots, some with cleavage displayed some with flowing sleeves, some ladies wear their hair bound or covered, and others loose. One thing you are pretty certain, by their looks and gestures, they seem pretty excited to have you here and if it wasn't for the armor, theyd see you're excited as well.

"We dont get much visitors here. Being a knight must be so much more exciting than living here, just us young blondes, redhairs and brunettes of feline, canine, lupine, lapine, vulpine equine and bovine origin, all between the ages of 16 and 21, only dressing, undressing, bathing all days and knights." she said as you came by the stairs and stopped pushing out her chest again, almost causing you to walk face first into it.

"I - see.." you said.

"Is there anything you'd wish to do now, or want us to get you?" She said while giving you a sultry look.
111.title: An Anthro Rabbit

1111.content:
You express you will to take a rest. Zoot hears your wish and calls for your chamber to be prepared.

After the vixen took you through another part of the castle (where you saw even more exotic and sultry looking females), she lead you towards a stone stair case.

"Your room, should be prepared by now. It's in the south most tower." She says. You try to pay attention, but you are being distracted by the shapely rear swaying in front of you as she leads you up. You finally arive by what you assume is your room.

"Have a pleasant night kind Knight and if you need anything.. ANYTHING... You may seek me at my room downstairs. For ANY reason, at Any time of the night." She said as she apprached you pushing out her chest again, making you slightly uncomfortable. You could also swear that at certain point she licked her lips.

"Thank you, but I don't think I'll be needing any help. Good night." You say as you slip inside your room.

"Thank goodness, that's over..." You sight. You start to remove your armor. You're down to your shirt and pants.

"Do you require help taking those of?" when suddenly a female voice asked. You jumped up and turned around almost having a heart attack. On the quite impressive looking bed you noticed 2 females. One was a fox, a red one with some blond hair comming from under her cap. She seemed younger and less imposing than Zoot, but still quite shapely looking. She was kneeling on the bed, awaitng your response. Laying next to her was a white rabbit. She looked shorter than the vixen, but seemd to have much curvaous body, accentuated by the pose she was in. Bottom of her habbit ridden up so you saw her shapely leg and round ass, and the low cut front was stretched by a pair of breasts Zoot is probably envious of.

"Who are you?" You asked as you got your grip.

"I'm sister Ras and that's sister Loppa. Sister Zoot asked as to make your room as comfortable as possible."

"Em, Thank you. That's very kind of you. You can go now, cause I'd like to go to bed now."

"That's what we're waiting for. We were istructed to make the night as pleasant as possible for you." Ras said with a pleasant smile, while Loppa gave you a sultry look and slid her hand from her rear to her breast.

"But I didn't..." You said but were interupted as Ras sat up. "If we don't satisfy you, we can always call someone else to help."
Next she proceed to streche the cleavage of her habit and puller out 2 large, creamy looking ripe breast. Each cupped with a delicate pink nipple.

"What do you say kind sir?"
1111.title: I'd like to go to bed now

"Just to show you that I am good with knots," she politely says, tightening the rope around your chest. She then claps her hands, and two women enter the room. One has brown hair tied in a bun. The other has blond hair tied in a ponytail. They both are wearing silk slips, with much cleavage displayed.

"These are the Ticklers," Zoot says. "They will take care of all your tickling needs." And with that Zoot exits the room. The lady ticklers then climb onto the bed, one on each side of you. This makes you both nervous and excited.

"So, what seems to be your most ticklish spot?" the blond one asks.

In a shy voice, you tell them...
1542.title: Ties You Up

choices: Used their fingernails on your belly
Used soft feathers on your belly
15422.content:
"My belly is my most ticklish spot." You say in an excited tone.

The girls immediately circle around your belly.

"You love getting your belly tickled sooooo much don't you?" They teased giggling a bit afterward.

"Yeah! Mercilessly too!" You say eager for tickling.

Wasting no time, the girls immediately...
15422.title: "My belly."

15423.content:
"My feet," you say blushing as the two ladies look at each other with a grin,
"Oooo, perfect!" one of them squeaks
"We love a man with nice, soft, ticklish feet," the other giggles. They move down to your feet in unison, hugging a leg each giving you even less movement then the tight rope allowed. Bringing their faces in line with your feet the women let out a happy sigh. "So soft..." One of them whispers across your foot their breath barely tickling but just adding to to the suspense. "Let's begin..." Whispers the other.

You close your eyes and concentrate on your feet, a stupid grin on your face already as the two ladies reach up with their long finger nails. You flinch as you feel a stroke on your left foot from arch to toes. The woman continued tickling you with those slow teasing strokes, making you bite your lip to hold back a giggle. Meanwhile the other one starts at your toes. They tickle at the flesh between each one on your right foot and manages to coax out a few light giggles from your gritted teeth. "Hehe, this is nice" you say, relaxing in the soft tickling.
"Hmmm?" Questions the one on your left foot "if you think this is nice..."
"...then maybe we should step it up a little..." Says the other
"...what do you say tough guy..."
"...think you can handle it?" Each time they speak, they blow across your feet adding to the sensations. You give it a little thought as they continue to tickle and finally decide...
15423.title: "My feet."

154231.content:
"I'm tough, I can take it," you say boldly. It seems to get the girls pumped as they grip your legs tighter and quickly pick up the pace. Before you know it they have both hands tickling each of your feet. The first one adds in the rest of the fingers to the upwards strokes with her left hand and then uses her right to tickle under your toes. The other one changes her technique completely and spider tickles over inch of your foot with both hands: tops, sides, toes and sole, no where is safe. "BWAHAHAHAHA, not that much!" you shout, but it's too late: the girls have worked the selves into frenzy and where showing no signs of slowing down. "Please!" you beg but no mercy is shown. You squirm, jerk, even try bouncing but the woman's legs have an iron grip on yours so there's no throwing them off. "Come on cutie," one of them says, giving your beg toe a ticklish nibble, "this is what you asked for," says the other as she reached up with her foot and tickles your inner thigh, getting you even more worked up.

After 10 minuets of intense foot tickling, the ladies final slow down a tad and you take the chance to gulp down as much air as you can. "You know, I'm starting to get tired of feet," says the one on your left foot whilst drawing lazy circles around your heel, "think I might give the torso a try," she says finally sitting up.
"What?" says the other "are you kidding! I could tickle them all night!"
"Then you can have the both! I'm going for the torso,"
"Thanks!"
With that the woman on your left slides up next to you and wraps an arm round you, lining her hands up with your lower ribs. The other one climbs over and straddles both of your legs, lying between them, she takes a foot in each hand and slowly start to tickle. Bow some silent countdown they begin and your thrown into laughter for another half an hour. The lady at your torso explores every inch of your body. She finds good spots in your armpits and around your waist line which she takes great pleasure in exploiting. Your left to simply squirm and laugh as your expertly tickled into haze of sensations.

Finally, the ladies let up. You pant and pant, soaked with sweat and grateful that they have finally stopped. "Wow what fun, your as ticklish as a little boy, it's so cute." The one at your feet says, massaging the tingling sensations out of your feet. Your too tired to reply and so just blush in response. "Well I think it's time to get some rest," the other says "your going to need your rest for tomorrow." Her words worry you slightly but you can't be bothered answering. The women show no sign of your untying you, so you simply fall asleep as you are, gently being tickled by the ladies breath or the occasional stray finger.

What's going to happen in the morning then?
154231.title: Step it up

1542312.content:
You wake up and find that the ladies have untied you. But now they are sitting over you.

"What would you like to do today?" One of them asks.

You then say that you would like...
1542312.title: Let's try something els

15423122.content:
...to have a relaxing massage. The two maidens giggle at that.

"But where shall we massage you, young sir?" one of the ladies asks.

"Sell you worked on my feet last night," you say, "so today it will have to be..."
15423122.title: To have a relaxing massage

155.content:
"I am not feeling well and may need a doctor..." You say

It's not really true, you're feeling perfectly well, but you're interested in seeing what these girls do with you.

You're led to a lavish bedroom with a canopy bed, Zoot requests you take off all your clothes and you do so...

You lay down on the bed, you marvel at the sensuousness of the satin sheets beneath you, you wiggle around for a moment simply enjoying the slightly tickly feel of the sheets on your skin.

Zoot meanwhile...
155.title: I am not feeling well and may need a doctor

1553.content:
...gets out some rope. And before you know it she has wrapped the rope completely around you.

"Why did you tie me up," you nervously ask.

"Just to show you that I am good with knots," she politely says, tightening the rope around your belly. She then claps her hands, and two women enter the room.

"These are the doctors," Zoot says. "They will take care of what ails you." And with that Zoot exits the room. The lady doctors then climb onto the bed, one on each side of you. This makes you both nervous and excited.

"Well, what seems to be the trouble?" one them asks.

In your best sick voice, you tell them...
1553.title: All Tied Up

15531.content:
The two doctors exchange a mischievous grin. One of them has short, blond curls, almond green eyes, and a shapely build; the other had long raven hair, large dark eyes, and a petite form.

"Oh, wicked, bad, naughty Zoot! It will be hard for us to examine his chest with all these ropes. What should we do, Prancy?" the smaller one asks.

"Hmmm..." Prancy says as her fingers dance lightly around your firm stomach. "The prioress will likely receive what she deserves, the fortunate bit. Let us discover what we can with him tied, Bace."

Bace nods and turns her pretty French-looking face to you as she puts a hand on your right knee. "May we proceed, Sir Knight?"

"Yes. Please, dear Sisters." You think about correcting her that you are only a squire still, but discretion something something valor.

Prancy smiles broadly and moves to the head of the bed as Bace climbs onto the bed and then straddles your hips. Their hands move over the space between the ropes, gleefully caressing your muscular chest. The two doctors approach would probably not advocated by Galen of Pergamon, but it is definitely making you feel better.

"You do not seem bruised, Sir Knight. Is there tension?" Prancy asks. She leans over to reach your lower pecs, causing your sight to change from her lovely face to her generous, beautiful bosom.

"I think he is, Prancy," Bace responds as she adjusts herself on your pelvis. Her fingers are feeling around your ribs, mixing a tickling sensation with your arousal.

"Understood," Prancy says and her fingers graze against your exposed nipple. "Well, Sir Knight, do you want use to release you from your bindings? Or should we find an alternative way to heal you?"
15531.title: "My chest hurts."

info.brief_description: Have your own adventure in Monty Python's Castle Anthrax.
info.description:
If you've seen "Monty Python and the Holy Grail," then you might remember Castle Anthrax, you know, that strange castle filled with giggling, young, nymphomaniac virgins/female doctors/nurses. Well in this interactive story, you (a furry, a scaly, a human, or a 'mon) stumble upon Castle Anthrax and are taken in by the beautiful virgins. What you do with the virgins (or what they do with you), whether it be sex, tickling, bathing, foot worship, navel gazing, or french kissing is entirely up to you. Here are some rules:

1. If there is sex, please do not go into great detail.
2. No homosexuality or lesbianism.
3. Other than that enjoy!

Disclaimer: I do not own Castle Anthrax it belongs to Monty Python.
